advancement.botaniacombat:mjolnir.desc:
Under the tempest's rage, where lightning dances free,
defeat Gaia Gaurdian II, and witness Thor's gift to thee.
botaniacombat.tagline.gaia_greatsword: A greatsword that fires seven beams
botaniacombat.page.gaiaGreatsword0: It is possible to use the power of $(item)Terrasteel$(0) and $(item)Gaia Spirits$(0)$(br)in tandem as long as the Spirits do not directly touch the Terrasteel. $(br2)Because $(item)Gaia Spreaders$(0) have an outer layer of $(item)Dreamwood$(0), it is possible to attach them to Terrasteel and keep the Gaia energy separate. By forging three $(item)Terra Blades$(0) together and affixing four $(item)Gaia Spreaders$(0), a massive, daunting greatsword is made.
botaniacombat.page.gaiaGreatsword2: Since the Gaia $(item)Gaia Greatsword$(0) is very heavy, it takes a great deal of effort and time to swing. A user of the $(item)Gaia Greatsword$(0) must take care to have enough "wind-up" time before getting too close to assailants.
